#Text= Zhao says : " We are the sons and daughters of fire , the superior element !

column1: #Text=Until today only one thing stood our path to victory , the Avatar .
#Text=I am here to tell you that he is now my prisoner !
#Text=This is the year Sozin 's Comet returns to grant us its power !
#Text=This is the year the Fire Nation breaks through the walls of Ba Sing Se and burns the city to the ground !
#Text=My friends are sick and they need you !
#Text=My friends need to suck on those frogs !
#Text=" Katara says : " How many times do I have to tell you , Momo ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Who 's this " Aang " kid you keep talking about , Your Highness ?
